code:
%% Translatable Attachments flow
flowchart LR
  subgraph DB[Infra_RedisCache]
    A[Infra_WorkerNode]
  end

  M[Infra_LoadBalancer] --> A

  Init[Infra_IngressController]
  Init -->|require backend| B[Infra_EtcdCluster]
  Init -->|register backend| Mobility[Infra_IngressController]

  B -->|provides| Apply[Infra_LoadBalancer]

  ModelCanonical[Infra_EtcdCluster]
  ModelDSL[Infra_EtcdCluster]

  ModelCanonical --> Apply
  ModelDSL --> Apply

  Apply -->|defines associations| Assoc[Infra_EtcdCluster]
  Apply -->|defines accessors| Accessors[Infra_IngressController]

  View[Infra_IngressController]
  View -->|uploads per-locale| Controller

  Controller[Infra_WorkerNode] -->|permits locale params or maps| Model
  Model -->|writer methods| ActiveStorage[Infra_RedisCache]
  ActiveStorage --> A

  Serve[Infra_RedisCache] -->|serves blob| UserBrowser[Infra_LoadBalancer]

  Accessors -->|getter fallback| Fallback[Infra_WorkerNode]
  Fallback --> ActiveStorage

  classDef infra fill:#f8f9fa,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class DB,Init,B,Apply,Assoc,Accessors,View,Controller,ActiveStorage,Serve,Fallback infra;
license_name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0
repo_description: The Better Together Community Engine is an accessible open source community platform that's Democratic by Design. All are welcome!
